pkgmetadata.longdescription: # [Markdown Live Preview](https://ms-jpq.github.io/markdown-live-preview)## Features- **Live Preview:** Updates preview on file save- **Auto Follow:** Focus on edited element- **Syntax Highlight:** Highlighted using [Pygments](https://github.com/pygments/pygments)- **Github flavoured:** Looks familiar## PreviewThe animation is only choppy because it's a compressed gif.![preview.gif](https://github.com/ms-jpq/markdown-live-preview/raw/md/preview/smol.gif)## Usage```bashmlp |name of markdown|```| Flags | Meaning || ---------------------- | ------------------------ || `-p, --port PORT=8080` | Port to use || `-o, --open` | No localhost restriction || `--nf, --no-follow` | Do not follow edits || `--nf, --no-browser` | Do not open browser |## [Install](https://pypi.org/project/markdown-live-preview)```bashpip install -U markdown_live_preview```
